title: Drawing, "Three Friezes"
medium: Pen and dark brown ink, brush and brown wash on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper row, left: bearded and foliated masks connected by festoons. At right, horizontal bar surrounded by waved vine branch. Bottom row: row of festoons hanging from disks in center of bow-knots. Above, festoons as tablets with inscriptions. Winged sphinx shown in profile, partly outlined.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Three Friezes".
Pen and dark brown ink, brush and brown wash on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1208.
